definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: It soon turned into black smog as the smoke of the citypoured into the air.
sentences.chinese: 随着城市的烟尘排入天空，白雾很快变成黑色烟雾。

sentences.english: Factory chimneys foul the air with smoke.
sentences.chinese: 工厂烟囱的烟尘污染了空气。

sentences.english: The air smelled like smoke and roared with noise.
sentences.chinese: 空气中漫溢着烟尘，充斥着噪音。

sentences.english: The converter sludges come out of the dedusting system during the production of steel making.
sentences.chinese: 转炉烟尘是炼钢生产过程中排出的含铁粉尘。

sentences.english: Furnace heating rapidly, temperature uniformity, no dust.
sentences.chinese: 炉内升温快，温度均匀，无烟尘。

sentences.english: Megan coughed hard because she was allergic to dust.
sentences.chinese: 梅金咳嗽个不停，因为她对烟尘过敏。

sentences.english: The dust of history has been toward the Shikumen, this demonstrates a new vitality.
sentences.chinese: 本已走向历史烟尘的石库门，由此彰显了新的生命力。

sentences.english: This paper describes experiments on treating arsenic bearing dust resulted in rotary roosting kiln.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了处理回转窑焙烧含砷物料所产烟尘的试验研究。

sentences.english: The emissions produced during coke oven coal-charging contain pernicious gases, pollute the environment, and is harmful to human health.
sentences.chinese: 焦炉装煤烟尘含有害物质，污染环境，危害人体健康。

sentences.english: He blames dust and smoke from the refinery and the presence of the red mud pond.
sentences.chinese: 他将之归咎于炼铝厂的烟尘和红色泥浆池塘的出现。

sentences.english: As thousands of carriages and horsemen fled to the south-west.
sentences.chinese: 九重城阙烟尘生，千乘万骑西南行。

sentences.english: Two is to reduce soot initial emissions and blackness.
sentences.chinese: 二是降低烟尘初始排放量和烟气黑度。

sentences.english: The air resounded with smoke and dust.
Behind me Soot, my black cat, started to purr.
sentences.chinese: 我身后烟尘，我国黑猫，开始发出喉音。

sentences.english: An experiment device is designed which uses the method of soot absorption of light to measure the thickness of soot.
sentences.chinese: 设计制作了光吸收法测定烟尘浓度的实验装置。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
